nodes.text: Weken was a terrestrial planet with two moons that was located within the Parthovian Cluster's Faarlsun system, in the Wild Space region of the galaxy. The planet occupied the third orbit around its star, the yellow-white Faarlsun, and had a poisonous environment.

Weken was first mentioned in the 1993 sourcebook Wanted by Cracken, written by Louis J. Prosperi for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Faarlsun system, and therefore Weken, in grid square T-4.
